description: The Imagine Austin comprehensive plan calls for an analysis and assessment of indicators or metrics that can be used to measure progress after the plan's fifth year.  Many of the indicators were suggested and not completely scoped, and some were aspirational, or not measurable at the time.  The indicators in this list are primarily tracked by other entities, or not deemed as highly relevant and therefore may not receive the same level of analysis as the primary indicators that are available at https://data.austintexas.gov/Government/Draft-Imagine-Austin-Indicators/d7k5-jyb8.  Indicators may be revised as new techniques or data become available.

metadata.attribution: City of Austin Planning and Development Review Department, Comprehensive Plan Division

name: Draft Additional Imagine Austin Indicators
